channel.title: Hoster\Coder
channel.description: Hi guys , this is kevin and i am looking for a Coder\Hoster to run a server. We both can be owners and run a server together :p Im willing to create forums and everything. If anyone is intrested , message me or comment below And i need someone that can code 600+. I am willing to put in alot of effort in this server with you.

item.title: Hoster\Coder
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:

Read my signature.
You need more information about your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster\Coder

item.description:

You say that you are willing to put a lot of effort? How about you start learning programming yourself?
[/quote] i cant portforward[/quote]

Umm… you can learn programming perfectly fine without portforwarding/hosting.

Read full topic
